price: 20. Waxaana idiinka yeellay dhexdiisa asbaabta noolaanshaha idinka iyo midka kastoo aydaan idinku irsaaqin7.
arabic: وَجَعَلۡنَا لَكُمۡ فِيهَا مَعَٰيِشَ وَمَن لَّسۡتُمۡ لَهُۥ بِرَٰزِقِينَ
footnotes: 7. Macnaha waxaa weeye Alle wuxuu idiin sakhiray dad iyo duunyo kale uu isagu wax siiyo oo irsaaqo. Macno kale waxaa weeye Alle wuxuu idin siiyaa waxyaalo aad ku noolataan oo sidoo kale siiyaa dhammaan uumanka kale.

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: wajaʿalnā lakum fīhā maʿāyisha waman lastum lahu birāziqīna
